content.value: When we set out to create the perfect sleep experience, we knew it would depend on one core factor: fabric.
Quince’s bedding materials are carefully selected and thoughtfully crafted to delivery the most restful sleep
possible from percale to linen to sateen to bamboo to cotton - we carry all the best fabrics in bed sheets,
pillow cases, duvet covers, and quilts to ensure you have the best sleep possible.

When we set out to create the perfect sleep experience, we knew it would depend on one core factor: fabric. Quince’s bedding materials are carefully selected and thoughtfully crafted to delivery the most restful sleep possible from percale to linen to sateen to bamboo to cotton - we carry all the best fabrics in bed sheets, pillow cases, duvet covers, and quilts to ensure you have the best sleep possible.
Bedding Materials Guide
Bedding Materials Guide
Offering a casually elegant look, our Linen is soft, breathable, and highly durable. Temperature-regulating, it’s perfect for year-round use. 100% European Flax, 150-gsm
Cool, matte, and super crisp, Percale is the go-to fabric for hot sleepers. 100% cotton, 400 thread count

Rich, silky smooth, and with a subtle sheen, Sateen is our most luxurious bedding. It’s thicker and smoother than Percale, and will keep you warm on cool nights. 
100% cotton, 500 thread count
Silky-smooth but highly breathable, Bamboo will keep you comfortable all night long. Even better - it’s super eco-friendly and naturally anti-bacterial. 100% organic bamboo

Made by Italian artisans on the outskirts of Florence, our Luxe Italian bedding is our highest quality 100% cotton percale, and mimics the style found in 5-star hotels around the world. 
100% cotton, 300 thread count

content.value: Every Quince product is guaranteed to meet or exceed the quality standards of leading luxury brands. If you're not completely satisfied we'll give you a full refund.
